Articles.Content:
My ship won't fly very well.

I think there might be a bit of debris stuck in the port-aft nacelle?

I think this angle shows it best.

And no, i have no idea what just happened ;-)

p.s.

This is not a serious post. More like a >s......< bug moment..

I've never even dreamed of seeing a whole runway in the hangar!
Ha ha ha neat! You should try and take that runway to the Mun!

Well, that happened.

What were you trying to build?

Well, that happened.

What were you trying to build?

Well, that is my mark III "Good Grief!" build of the structural-girder-elasticity-launched runway horizontal takeoff no-aerodynamics spaceplane, of course.

If i ever get it working, I will post to challenges..
